question: Which of the following are called "scheduled areas" as per Indian constitution?
option1: Tribal inhabited areas located in North East India
option2: Tribal inhabited areas which are located in other parts of India other than North East India
option3: Tribal inhabited areas located all over India including NE states
answer: Tribal inhabited areas which are located in other parts of India other than North East India
explanation: Tribal inhabited areas which are located in other parts of India than North East India. Tribal areas of the Assam, Meghalaya, Tripura and Mizoram are separately dealt with provisions given in 5th schedule
